News.headline: Dagenham and Redbridge Community Project: Boys Development Centre
News.page_title: Dagenham and Redbridge Community Project: Boys Development Centre
News.URL_keywords: Dagenham and Redbridge Community Project: Boys Development Centre
News.short_description: Leading up to our annual Daggers Against Racism day fixture against Guiseley this Saturday 18th February, we will be showcasing some of the projects that are run by our Community Trust
News.description:
Our Community Trust run a variety of different projects to local residents of Barking and Dagenham, one of those projects is Boys Development Centre

Our popular Player Development Centre runs every Thursday at Goals, Dagenham. The development centre is for young players aged 7 to 11 years of age runs weekly from  5:30pm – 7pm.

Our new PDC will focus on individual player development and technique before moving into small sided games at the end of each session. The session will cost £4 per week with no upfront costs.

If you would like to book a place on this programme or would like any further information on any of the great work the Community Trust are doing please do not hesitate in contacting us on 0208-592-1549 ext 30 or email us on fitc@daggers.co.uk

For full details of our annual Daggers Against Racism Day please click here
